annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 电子信息发送服务提供者和应用软件下载服务提供者，应当履行安全管理义务，知道其用户有前款规定行为的，应当停止提供服务，采取消除等处置措施，保存有关记录，并向有关主管部门报告。
annotations.translation: Service providers of electronic information transmission and application software download shall fulfill their security management obligations. If they become aware that their users have engaged in the actions stipulated in the preceding paragraph, they must cease providing services, take disposal measures such as elimination, keep relevant records, and report to the relevant competent authorities.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十二条 网络运营者不得泄露、篡改、毁损其收集的个人信息；未经被收集者同意，不得向他人提供个人信息。但是，经过处理无法识别特定个人且不能复原的除外。
annotations.translation: Article 42: Network operators must not leak, alter, or damage the personal information they collect; Personal information must not be provided to others without the consent of the person being collected. However, this is not the case if the specific individual cannot be identified after processing and cannot be restored.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十三条 个人发现网络运营者违反法律、行政法规的规定或者双方的约定收集、使用其个人信息的，有权要求网络运营者删除其个人信息；发现网络运营者收集、存储的其个人信息有错误的，有权要求网络运营者予以更正。网络运营者应当采取措施予以删除或者更正。
annotations.translation: Article 43: Any individual who discovers that any network operator collects and uses their personal information in violation of law, administrative regulations, or the agreement between both parties has the right to require the network operator to delete his personal information; they have the right to require the network operator to correct any mistakes in the personal information collected and stored by the network operator. The network operator shall take measures to delete or correct the information.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十四条 任何个人和组织不得窃取或者以其他非法方式获取个人信息，不得非 法出售或者非法向他人提供个人信息。
annotations.translation: Article 44: No individual or organization may steal or otherwise illegally obtain personal information, or sell or provide personal information to others in an illegal manner.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十五条 依法负有网络安全监督管理职责的部门及其工作人员，必须对在履行 职责中知悉的个人信息、隐私和商业秘密严格保密，不得泄露、出售或者非法向他人提供。
annotations.translation: Article 45: Departments and their staffs who are lawfully responsible for cybersecurity supervision and management must strictly keep confidential personal information, privacy, and commercial secrets that they learn about while performing their duties, and they must not leak, sell, or illegally provide them to others.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十六条 任何个人和组织应当对其使用网络的行为负责，不得设立用于实施诈骗，传授犯罪方法，制作或者销售违禁物品、管制物品等违法犯罪活动的网站、通讯群组，不得利用网络发布涉及实施诈骗，制作或者销售违禁物品、管制物品以及其他违法犯罪活动的信息。
annotations.translation: Article 46: Any individual or organization shall be responsible for its use of the network and shall not set up websites or communication groups used to commit fraud, teach criminal methods, produce or sell prohibited items, controlled items, or other illegal and criminal activities, and shall not use the network to publish information involving the commission of fraud, the production or sale of prohibited items, controlled items, and other illegal and criminal activities.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十七条 网络运营者应当加强对其用户发布的信息的管理，发现法律、行政法规禁止发布或者传输的信息的，应当立即停止传输该信息，采取消除等处置措施，防止信息扩散，保存有关记录，并向有关主管部门报告。
annotations.translation: Article 47: Network operators should strengthen the management of information released by their users, and if they discover information that is prohibited from being published or transmitted by laws and administrative regulations, they should immediately stop transmitting the information, take measures such as erasure to stop it from spreading, keep relevant records, and report to the relevant competent authorities.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第四十八条 任何个人和组织发送的电子信息、提供的应用软件，不得设置恶意程序，不得含有法律、行政法规禁止发布或者传输的信息。
annotations.translation: Article 48: Electronic information transmitted or application software provided by any individual or organization shall not contain malicious programs or information prohibited from publishing or transmission by law or administrative regulations.

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 网络运营者应当采取技术措施和其他必要措施，确保其 收集的个人信息安全，防止 信息泄露、毁损、丢失。在 发生或者可能发生个人信息泄露、毁损、丢失的情况时，应当立即采取补救措施，按照规定及时告知用户并向有关主管部门报告。
annotations.translation: Network operators should take technical and other necessary measures to ensure the security of the personal information they collect and to prevent information leakage, damage, and loss. When personal information leakage, damage, or loss occurs or may occur, remedial measures shall be taken immediately, users must be notified in a timely manner in accordance with regulations, and reports shall be made to relevant competent authorities.
